actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a distribution deduction in the case of certain cemetery perpetual care fund trusts.

summary.text: Provides for a distribution deduction under the Internal Revenue Code in the case of specified cemetery perpetual care fund trusts. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 642(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a distribution deduction in the case of certain cemetery perpetual care fund trusts.
